title: 命令方块问题 版本1.8.9
author: 方块史蒂夫
txt_content:
请各位为我刷一把钻石剑   自定义描述:此钻石剑很厉害.    加上无法破坏指令和伤害+10(这个指令是自定义属性,不是附魔)
          请各位大神帮忙!
       版本:1.8.9




     谢谢

replies.author: IkaroInory
replies.txt_content:
/give @a minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {Unbreakable:1b,display:{Lore:["此钻石剑很厉害."]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:10d,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}


另外推荐一下 MCE 指令编辑器：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-802231-1-1.html

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: /give @p diamond_sword 1 0 {display:{Name:"超级无敌大宝剑",Lore:["牛逼","牛逼牛逼牛逼"]},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"generic.maxHealth",Amount:100,Operation:0,UUIDMost:95740,UUIDLeast:861313},{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"generic.attackDamage",Amount:9999,Operation:0,UUIDMost:77169,UUIDLeast:903514}],ench:[{id:16,lvl:30000},{id:17,lvl:30000},{id:18,lvl:30000},{id:19,lvl:30000},{id:20,lvl:30000}],Unbreakable:1}
